posts.post_content:
I know I know, it's non-sport, but I haven't gotten any luck on the non-sports board or advertising with The Wrapper...

If anyone has low-grade N99 Civil War Battle Scenes they'd like to sell me, I'd be interested. I have a bit less than half of the set of 25, and I've kinda hit a roadblock. I can reasonably afford to pay no more than $25 per card.

Thanks
AR
